pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Du2 li4 Zhan4 zheng1

definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
